description:

On the other hand, he's very confident in who he is, and really doesn't give a fuck what other people think. So doing the scene was part of that confidence.
Drew was very nervous when we got started and then a switch was thrown and he was talking all dirty. Probably the most verbose guy I have ever worked with. I loved it of course.
It's a pretty straight forward servicing, with the great verbal is the icing on the cake!
SPOILER: Drew was one of the guys that actually busted just after the 3 minute mark. We cleaned up, he went outside to have a smoke, and came back with his dick bone hard. So we shot some more oral to flesh this video out to about 7-8 minutes.
So you need to listen to him near the cumshot as he whispers to me to ease up and "too late". The actual cumshot was actually a misfire, but its so copious and right on, that it is pretty hot. Most of the cock sucking in this video was done mere minutes after he had busted. I probably could have gotten him to bust again, but there is something to be said for a short video and a short download time.
title: Bryan & Drew Freeman - Serviced
